body_html:
This happens because the environment isn't shipped in the genrule. A skylark auto-conf kinda rules could be used instead to generate the genrule. After seeing the code, it might even be possible to ship the zlib imported by a remote repository as a parameter for libpng

As a workaround, adding the list of export to that line should do the trick.
body_text:
This happens because the environment isn't shipped in the genrule. A skylark auto-conf kinda rules could be used instead to generate the genrule. After seeing the code, it might even be possible to ship the zlib imported by a remote repository as a parameter for libpng
As a workaround, adding the list of export to that line should do the trick.
body:
This happens because the environment isn't shipped in the genrule. A skylark auto-conf kinda rules could be used instead to generate the genrule. After seeing the code, it might even be possible to ship the zlib imported by a remote repository as a parameter for libpng

As a workaround, adding the list of export to [that line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/png.BUILD#L30) should do the trick.
